description: This file is an Entity Framework Core migration class that defines the initial database schema for a secure chat application. It creates tables for users, contacts, conversations, messages, attachments, and device tokens, along with indexes and foreign key constraints to enforce relationships and data integrity.

classes.name: InitialCreate
classes.description: A migration class inheriting from Migration that sets up the initial database schema when applied.

methods.name: Up
methods.description: Defines the operations to apply the migration, creating tables, constraints, and indexes for the initial schema.

methods.name: Down
methods.description: Defines the operations to revert the migration, dropping all created tables in reverse order.
